attributes.action: Calls upon all elected MPs to honestly reflect whether PM is fit for office.
attributes.additional_details: As a Public health consultant and GP I have given my all for this country; Sing that our prime minister can out with such disregard for everybody else other than himself and those of his set, and I think it is beyond unfair.
attributes.background: Honesty and integrity should be prerequisites for becoming An MP; the current PM  demonstrably lacks candour and integrity and now hinders the Government ability to lead at a time of crisis.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
